department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Design and Supply of Chinook FWD & AFT Ski Containers
description: This is a tender for the [Design and Supply of Chinook FWD & AFT Ski Containers]
full_summary:
################################################################################

**Design and Supply of Chinook FWD & Aft Ski Containers**

**Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** WS4359570830

**Issued on:** 2023-12-22

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-16T14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-07-31

**Type:** Request for Proposal

**Method of Contract Award:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Scope of Work:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposal submissions from qualified suppliers to design and supply Chinook FWD and Aft ski containers.

**Requirements:**

* The supplier must be knowledgeable in the design and manufacture of specialized luggage containers.
* The supplier must be able to provide containers that meet specific requirements for the Chinook helicopter service.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to suppliers under the following international trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Quinte West, Ontario

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Crystal Denton (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18354014?extsite=MTgzNTQwMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

################################################################################
